    • createFriendship

      public boolean createFriendship​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> friendshipMap) throws ValidationException, RepositoryException
      Add a new friendship between two users from the input data
      Parameters:
      friendshipMap - key-value pairs representing the friendship attributes
      Returns:
      true if saved; false otherwise
      Throws:
      ValidationException - when at least one value is invalid
      RepositoryException - when id is not a number or does not exist in User repository

    • readOneFriendship

      public java.lang.String readOneFriendship​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> friendshipMap) throws ValidationException
      Read the friendship of the given user ids
      Parameters:
      friendshipMap - key-value pairs representing the friendship attributes
      Returns:
      found friendship as string; empty string otherwise
      Throws:
      ValidationException - when id string is empty or contains an invalid number

    • deleteFriendship

      public boolean deleteFriendship​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> friendshipMap) throws RepositoryException
      Delete the friendship of the given user ids
      Parameters:
      friendshipMap - key-value pairs representing the friendship attributes
      Returns:
      true if friendship is found and deleted; false otherwise
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - if the given id is null, not a number or if there is no entity with the given id
